TITLE: 10-SPEED SELECTSHIFT® AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: The 10-speed transmission in the Lincoln Navigator helps to balance power with performance. With 10 independent shift points, the engine can operate in its sweet spot and avoid the highs and lows associated with fewer gears.

TITLE: TWIN-TURBOCHARGED 3.5L ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Capable of producing 450 horsepower* and 510 lb.-ft. of torque,* the twin-turbocharged 3.5L engine in the Navigator is a true powerhouse. With smooth and controlled power, the Lincoln Navigator performs in a way that matches both your mood and the road. Additionally, this vehicle features five standard, selectable Lincoln Drive Modes, as well as a sixth available Slow Climb drive mode.**

TITLE: AUTO HOLD
DESCRIPTION: Auto Hold helps to reduce the effort of keeping your vehicle still at stop signs, signals and other braking situations. When you bring the vehicle to a standstill using the brake pedal, you can stop depressing the brake and the system will hold the vehicle in position, even on hills. When you engage the accelerator, Auto Hold will then release the brakes.

TITLE: Lincoln Drive Modes
DESCRIPTION: Satisfy both your desire for control and need for excitement with the simple twist of a dial. From Conserve to Excite, the Lincoln Navigator offers five standard, distinct selectable drive modes for confidence, exhilaration and control in a wide variety of driving conditions. These modes include Slippery, Excite, Conserve, Deep Conditions, and Normal, as well as a sixth, available Slow Climb* drive mode. Each mode has a number of calculated settings that tune the vehicle, including the available adaptive suspension, shift points, 4x2 vs. 4x4 drive lines, information displays and more — and it all happens with the simple twist of a knob.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: Road conditions vary and, for smooth and confident driving, your suspension should too. The adaptive suspension controls the up-and-down movement of the wheels when driving on uneven surfaces and over potholes. This system, controlled by the five standard selectable Lincoln Drive Modes*—including Deep Conditions for sandy terrain—helps to decrease the stress of harsh driving situations without compromising the comfort within.

TITLE: TOWING CAPABILITIES
DESCRIPTION: Make simple work of heavy loads with best-in-class towing.* With a twin-turbocharged engine capable of producing 450 horsepower and 510 lb.-ft. of torque,** and an engine-adapting standard tow/haul mode, the Navigator seamlessly translates power into towing performance—up to 8,700 lbs. Additionally, a Heavy-Duty Trailer Tow Package is available.

TITLE: HEAVY-DUTY TRAILER TOW PACKAGE*
DESCRIPTION: In situations where power truly matters, the Lincoln Navigator delivers. The Heavy-Duty Trailer Tow Package features a Class IV trailer with 4-pin and 7-pin connectors, heavy-duty radiator, smart trailer tow, trailer brake controller and trailer sway control. With this package, electronic traction assist delivers an almost infinite combination of torque to each wheel, making for greater confidence and control when towing heavy loads in virtually any driving condition. Plus, with Pro Trailer Backup Assist,™ you can let go of the wheel* and use a simple knob to effortlessly back up your trailer. Additionally, a 2-speed transfer case and Slow Climb drive mode are included on 4x4 models.

TITLE: ALL-ALUMINUM-ALLOY BODY
DESCRIPTION: The all-aluminum-alloy body of the Lincoln Navigator gives new meaning to the phrase “less is more.” The reduced weight from aluminum, when compared to previous generations, allows Navigator to be enriched with cutting-edge features that enhance comfort, quietness and the driving experience. This pairing of frame and body helped the Lincoln Navigator earn the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration’s (NHTSA’s) 2018 5-Star Overall Vehicle Score in its New Car Assessment Program—the highest possible rating.

TITLE: FOUR-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Whether it’s on the road or off, available 4x4 capability offers true mastery of your journey. The Navigator’s 4x4 powertrain unlocks and deftly applies the twin-turbocharged engine’s 450 horsepower* and 510 lb.-ft. of torque,* making rugged driving conditions easily traversed. Plus, by adding available Hill Descent Control™ and tow hooks, trying situations will be easily overcome.

TITLE: ENHANCED ACTIVE PARK ASSIST
DESCRIPTION: Parallel and perpendicular parking the Lincoln Navigator requires less effort and strain thanks to standard Enhanced Active Park Assist.61 Ultrasonic sensors can locate an available spot and, while you control the shifter buttons, brake and accelerator, the vehicle steers itself into place. Plus, with class-exclusive* park out assist, the same technology that helped guide you in helps make getting out just as effortless.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The standard Lane-Keeping System61* uses a camera mounted behind the windshield’s rearview mirror to monitor road lane markings and detect unintentional drifting toward the outside of a lane. If the camera detects an impending drift, the system will use the steering system and the instrument cluster display to alert and/or aid you to stay in your lane.

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST WITH AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Technology that’s looking ahead. Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking61 can help potentially avoid or lessen the severity of traffic accidents.* The system uses radar to scan the roadway ahead of the vehicle for pedestrians and if any are detected, it provides a collision warning and automatically applies the brake if the driver is unable to take corrective action.

TITLE: FORWARD AND REVERSE SENSING
DESCRIPTION: The Forward and Reverse Sensing Systems help drivers in a number of ways. From assisting with active parking to helping while the vehicle is slowly approaching an object, the sensors make both the road ahead and the road behind easy to manage.

TITLE: HEAD-UP DISPLAY
DESCRIPTION: The available head-up display* helps to prove that what lies ahead is just as important as what is happening now. The system helps to create a custom driving experience by letting drivers choose what data to display, from standard driving information to available Adaptive Cruise Control settings, Lane-Keeping System information and more. Digital light projection technology allows the display to be visible in different ambient lighting conditions.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Available Adaptive Cruise Control* with Stop-and-Go capability and Front Collision Warning makes your drive even more effortless. When the Navigator is in adaptive cruise mode, radar scans the road ahead and detects if you are approaching slower traffic. The system can automatically brake and accelerate to keep you at your set speed or follow with the pace of traffic when speeds are below your set speed. With the addition of Stop-and-Go, the feature can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in congested traffic and restart it as traffic begins to move.** Plus, the system can also warn you when an object or pedestrian is detected ahead. If you do not respond in time, the system can automatically precharge the brakes to provide full responsiveness when you do brake and can even apply the brakes if you take no action.

TITLE: REVEL® ULTIMA AUDIO SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The available Revel® Ultima Audio System* combines form and function to reproduce a live-music experience right in the comfort of your vehicle. 20 intentionally placed speakers as well as Stereo, Audience and Onstage sound modes help make the sounds you hear as pure and rich as they were originally intended.

TITLE: LINCOLN CONNECT™
DESCRIPTION: With standard Lincoln Connect,™* you and your passengers can enjoy seamless connectivity. All models feature a 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot that enables up to 10 devices to be connected at the same time. Plus, with the embedded modem, you can use the Lincoln Way™ app to its fullest and even keep track of your Wi-Fi data usage. Whether in the vehicle or up to 50 feet away, you can access the hotspot and make lasting connections.

TITLE: SYNC® APPLINK®
DESCRIPTION: SYNC® 3* empowers you to customize your drive. With SYNC 3, you can connect and control your smartphone with Apple CarPlay® and Android Auto.™ You can give commands with your voice in order to do things like locate and navigate to your favorite restaurants. The system also integrates your information and entertainment applications through AppLink.® With a 10-inch LCD touchscreen and two smart-charging USB ports, this technology hub equips drivers with everything they want on the road, including the peace of mind of 911 Assist.®

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING AND POWER PORTS
DESCRIPTION: Charging your phone is now as simple as setting it down. Inside the center front console media bin is a standard inductive charger that wirelessly charges compatible phones.*

TITLE: LINCOLN PLAY

Content can be accessed through USB, SD card, HDMI cord and Lightning Digital AV adapter with Apple® devices or a compatible HDMI cord and Android™ devices. Thanks to the standard embedded modem with Wi-Fi hotspot in your vehicle, users who own a compatible Slingbox® can access their TV channels on the go.*

Because the LEDs selected for use in the Navigator were designed for the lifetime of the vehicle, you may never need to replace a single one.

TITLE: LINCOLN DRIVE MODES
DESCRIPTION: There’s a drive mode to match your mood and road conditions. Lincoln Drive Modes, easily selected by simply turning a knob in the center front console, alter the suspension settings, steering, shift points and even ride heights with the available Air Glide Suspension to help give drivers both the feeling they want and the performance they need. In addition to the main five modes, Aviator Grand Touring* has two additional modes: Pure EV for a quiet all-electric drive and Preserve EV to save stored energy for later use.

TITLE: All-Wheel Drive
DESCRIPTION: The rear-wheel-drive platform in the Lincoln Aviator was designed to also accommodate all-wheel drive.* Doing so gives you the option to choose what best meets your needs: the feel of rear-wheel drive,* or the confident grip of available all-wheel drive.

TITLE: AIR GLIDE SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Aviator has an available Air Glide Suspension, which replaces traditional hard coil springs with air bladder springs. These can be inflated and deflated to help soften your ride, creating the sensation of riding on air, quite literally. This system allows the vehicle to kneel down to greet you as you approach and to raise and lower based on specific drive modes.

TITLE: LINCOLN CO-PILOT360™ PLUS*
DESCRIPTION: Experience a package of advanced technologies that help make every journey a confident one.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Now, navigating traffic can feel a little less stressful. Adaptive Cruise Control with Traffic Jam Assist* marries camera and radar, enabling the Aviator to detect and adjust to the pace of cars ahead of you. Stop-and-Go functionality allows the vehicle to come to a complete stop and restart** when traffic begins to move. Speed Sign Recognition helps keep your journey as seamless as possible. When you place the system into intelligent mode, the front-facing camera screens the road ahead to locate speed-limit signs. Once a sign is recognized, the system can adjust the speed of the vehicle to match your preset speed tolerance.

TITLE: EVASIVE STEERING ASSIST*
DESCRIPTION: Cameras and sensors work in tandem to help offer steering assistance. If your Lincoln detects that a frontal collision is imminent, it can apply the brakes, giving the vehicle greater stability which helps you steer around an obstacle.

TITLE: REVERSE BRAKE ASSIST
DESCRIPTION: With Reverse Brake Assist, drivers can feel more confident when in Reverse. If rear sensors detect an obstacle behind the vehicle while you’re backing up, the system can automatically apply the brakes to help you avoid a potential collision.*

TITLE: ACTIVE PARK ASSIST PLUS
DESCRIPTION: It’s as simple as pressing a button. In parallel and reverse perpendicular parking situations, the driver no longer needs to control acceleration, braking, turning or shifting.* Now all drivers have to do is place the vehicle in Neutral and press the park assist button throughout the duration of parking, making tight situations a little less tricky. Once securely in the space, the driver simply places the vehicle into park to complete the process.

TITLE: HEAD-UP DISPLAY
DESCRIPTION: Create a driving experience to your liking with the available head-up display.* You can select the information that you’d like to see, including standard driving information, available Adaptive Cruise Control settings, Lane-Keeping System information and more. Digital light projection technology allows the display to be visible in ambient lighting conditions, even when the driver is wearing polarized sunglasses.

TITLE: Phone As A Key
DESCRIPTION: It’s as simple as its name, using your personal smartphone as a key.* With a few simple steps via the available Lincoln Way™ app, you can program your phone to act as the key to the Lincoln Aviator.** Via a Bluetooth® connection, your phone will grant you entry into the Lincoln Aviator and allow you to start it and drive away. You’ll never have to take your key fob with you again. And should your phone run out of power, you can simply enter backup codes to gain access into, start and drive the vehicle.

TITLE: Many Firsts for Lincoln
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Aviator represents the culmination of many firsts for Lincoln. Features include the first Lincoln to offer available pixel LED headlamps, Phone As A Key technology,* Active Park Assist Plus, Reverse Brake Assist, adaptive suspension with road preview, an available 28-speaker Revel® Ultima 3D Audio System and Speed Sign Recognition, just to name a few.**

TITLE: REVEL® ULTIMA 3D AUDIO SYSTEM*
DESCRIPTION: Immerse yourself in sound. Lincoln and Revel Audio sound engineers worked together to map the cabin of the Lincoln Aviator and placed 28 speakers throughout the interior so you can enjoy a true 3D audio experience. The end result is an acoustic masterpiece that will have you experiencing sound in a new way. To help you make the most of your available Revel®* System, Lincoln offers each new 2020 Aviator owner and lessee a complimentary year-long membership to TIDAL®**, the high-fidelity music streaming service that places a library of over sixty million songs at your fingertips.

TITLE: SYNC® 3 APPLINK™
DESCRIPTION: SYNC® 3 AppLink™53 allows you to connect with the Lincoln Aviator and use voice controls for some of your favorite compatible mobile apps — creating an experience that is truly connected. Not only can you launch and voice-control your favorite mobile apps, but you can also access them in the organized SYNC-enabled apps section and automatically load them from your paired and/or tethered smartphone.

TITLE: WAZE™
DESCRIPTION: Using Waze™ inside your Lincoln is now easier since the much-loved, crowd-sourced navigation and traffic app is now compatible with SYNC® 3 AppLink™. By accessing Waze™ through SYNC® 3 AppLink™, you can collaborate with other users, outsmart traffic by sharing information to get the best routes and receive real-time alerts about accidents, road hazards and traffic jams. You can operate Waze™ through your vehicle’s touchscreen, as well as use voice commands for hands-free control, helping to keep your eyes on the road.* Available via iPhone® in Lincoln vehicles equipped with SYNC® 3. Waze™ is also available on Android Auto™.

TITLE: LINCOLN + ALEXA
DESCRIPTION: Lincoln+Alexa brings the amazing capabilities of Amazon Alexa from your home to the road.* By using the Lincoln+Alexa app and connecting via SYNC® 3 AppLink™, you’ll have access to voice navigation, traffic information, more than 45,000 skills, Amazon Prime shopping and can even control your supported smart-home devices.

TITLE: TIDAL*
DESCRIPTION: High fidelity. Low effort. TIDAL, a streaming music and entertainment subscription service, grants subscribers access to more than 60 million songs. With the Lincoln Aviator you can bring every last one with you and listen in available full-cabin surround.

TITLE: 4G LTE Wi-Fi
DESCRIPTION: Lincoln Connect™,* an embedded modem, lets you and your passengers easily access a 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot. Up to 10 devices can be connected at the same time with an operational range of up to 50 feet from the vehicle. Plus, with an available active Lincoln Way™ app you can track your Wi-Fi usage.

TITLE: Lincoln Embrace
DESCRIPTION: You’re near and your Aviator can tell. When it senses your approach, the Lincoln Embrace* activate as if to say “Welcome back” and “Where to next?”

TITLE: APPROACH DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: When your key fob or your personal smartphone, if you have activated Phone As A Key* via the Lincoln Way™ App,** is within a detectable range, the Lincoln Aviator responds to your approach. A dazzling array of welcome lighting in the front, rear and interior warmly greets you. Plus, models with the available Air Glide Suspension will lower themselves to help make getting in easier.

TITLE: WELCOME MAT
DESCRIPTION: As part of the approach feature sequence the door handle pockets softly glow while a Lincoln logo welcome mat is projected from the sideview mirror, illuminating the ground below the door. These lights help to guide the way while helping you see any debris, unevenness or water, making for more sure-footed entrances.

TITLE: EXTERIOR LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: It’s a warm and welcoming experience that helps guide the way. Tied to the approach detection sequence, the signature lamps and taillamps gradually reach full illumination.

TITLE: POWERFOLD® THIRD-ROW
DESCRIPTION: The convenience of added cargo room with the press of a button. The split PowerFold third-row comfortably seats two passengers and can be easily folded flat with the press of a button.

TITLE: LIGHT TOUCH HANDLE
DESCRIPTION: The Light Touch Handle allows users to gently grasp the door handle and, with a light pull, the door opens. Available Soft Close Doors gently pull the doors closed for you.

TITLE: COMFORT AT YOUR COMMAND
DESCRIPTION: Time is perhaps one of the most valuable luxuries in life. That’s why we’ve gone to great lengths to ensure the time you spend in a Lincoln Aviator is equally as relaxing as it is thrilling.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE PIXEL LED HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Placing light where it's needed. The adaptive pixel LED headlamps* apply a number of technologies to appropriately place light both on and off the road. At highway speeds, speed-dependent lighting is designed to shine light farther into the distance; at slower speeds, the light array widens, helping drivers to detect pedestrians and potential hazards. Light-bending functionality uses camera technology to read road signs and lane markings to pre-illuminate the direction the road is heading.

TITLE: AVIATOR AND AVIATOR RESERVE GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: A large Lincoln Star logo is centrally located on a field of repeating chrome Lincoln logo-like shapes.

TITLE: AVIATOR GRAND TOURING GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: The dazzling grille of the Lincoln Aviator Grand Touring series* makes the most of both negative and positive space. The central Lincoln Star logo is surrounded by raised and repeated Lincoln star logo shapes.

TITLE: LINCOLN BLACK LABEL GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: Tightly packed, raised and repeated Lincoln Star-like logo shapes surround the central Lincoln Star logo that illuminates to create the Lincoln Aviator Black Label* grille.

TITLE: SYMPHONIC CHIMES
DESCRIPTION: A bow being drawn across the strings of a violin, the soft yet recognizable tempo from a marimba and the mellow echo of a viola. The Detroit Symphony Orchestra has recorded soothing yet still attention-getting musical alerts that serve as noncritical, soft-warning and hard-warning chimes. Now, when your door is slightly ajar, the sound you hear will be equally informative while aiming for a far more soothing experience.

TITLE: LINCOLN AVIATOR BLACK LABEL
DESCRIPTION: Elevate your Lincoln experience. Featuring a curated collection of interior designer themes—meticulously brought to life in high-end materials—and a host of membership privileges, Lincoln Black Label* not only engages the senses and imagination, but also represents the ultimate in Lincoln luxury, comfort and service. Premium maintenance service with pickup and delivery, complimentary anytime car washes and annual detailing, along with access to the exclusive Culinary Collection—an expertly selected list of notable restaurants providing at-your-service dining-- are just some of the privileges of being a Lincoln Black Label owner.**

TITLE: 8-Speed Transmission
DESCRIPTION: Experience an effortless sensation when shifting gears. A new 8-speed transmission combines with 4-wheel independent suspension to provide agility, nimbleness and easy handling.

TITLE: 2.3L TURBOCHARGED ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Spirited power and agility. The available 2.3L I-4 engine puts out 295 horsepower* and 310 lb.-ft. of torque to deliver an energetic and seemingly frictionless driving experience.

TITLE: 2.0L TURBOCHARGED ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: A 2.0L I-4 engine supports smooth acceleration with 250 horsepower* and 280 lb.-ft. of torque, making this compact luxury crossover fun to drive.

TITLE: Lincoln Drive Modes
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Corsair is ready to adapt and respond to the changing environment with five unique drive modes designed to handle different road conditions. Choose from Normal, Excite, Conserve, Slippery and Deep Conditions by turning a conveniently placed knob in the center front console.

TITLE: Services
DESCRIPTION: Enjoy a collection of exclusive luxury services that make life more effortless. The Lincoln Way™* app allows you to operate your vehicle remotely, schedule Lincoln Pickup & Delivery,™** find and reserve parking in select cities, and access a personal concierge. Lincoln Concierge has a team of experts ready to connect you with Roadside Assistance, maintenance, warranty coverage and other services that customize your experience.

TITLE: Intelligent All-Wheel Drive
DESCRIPTION: Drive with confidence in any season. Available intelligent all-wheel drive technology optimizes performance by seamlessly switching between front-wheel drive and all-wheel drive in response to road conditions. Paired with Lincoln Drive Modes, the all-wheel drive delivers power and performance when it's needed.

TITLE: New Rear Suspension
DESCRIPTION: Smooth moves. The new rear suspension in the Lincoln Corsair is designed to minimize harshness, noise and vibration to enhance interior quietness.

TITLE: Adaptive Suspension
DESCRIPTION: Experience spirited agility and hug-the-road performance with a vehicle that smoothly glides over elevated terrain and bumps in the road. Available adaptive suspension uses a suite of sensors that constantly monitor the vehicle’s suspension motion, body movement, steering and braking. Data from these sensors is sent to the central computer which adjusts the suspension damping in milliseconds to help keep the vehicle smoothly on its course. The system also allows the user to customize the ride.

TITLE: Piano Key Shifter
DESCRIPTION: The streamlined design of the piano key shifter strikes a chord. When you need to switch gears, simply touch the key for Park, Drive, Neutral or Reverse and watch your selected setting illuminate.

TITLE: Active Park Assist Plus
DESCRIPTION: Make parking a breeze. Available Active Park Assist Plus61 will guide you into parallel or perpendicular parking spots with step-by-step instructions and alert you if an object is getting close to your vehicle. All steering, shifting, braking and accelerating controls are performed by the system.

TITLE: Adaptive Cruise Control With Traffic Jam Assist
DESCRIPTION: Keep pace with traffic. Available Adaptive Cruise Control with Traffic Jam Assist including Stop-and-Go61 lets you set speed and distance, then brakes and accelerates so your vehicle can go with the flow. Adaptive Cruise Control is also available with Lane Centering and Speed Sign Recognition.

TITLE: Evasive Steering Assist
DESCRIPTION: Avoid potential collisions in unpredictable situations. Available Evasive Steering Assist61 uses cameras and sensors to monitor vehicles ahead of you. If the system detects a frontal collision is imminent, it can provide steering support when the collision cannot be avoided by braking alone.

TITLE: Reverse Brake Assist
DESCRIPTION: Available Reverse Brake Assist can detect both stationary and moving objects behind the vehicle—like other vehicles, people, garage pillars and approaching cross-traffic—and apply the brakes to help mitigate a collision.61 An audible and visual warning will be provided by the system prior to braking—keeping you alert and quickly reacting for you if necessary.

TITLE: Front Sensing System
DESCRIPTION: Moving forward with smart technology. The available Front Sensing System* can alert you to things you may have missed as you maneuver into or out of a parking spot. Sensors in the front bumper can detect objects within six feet of your vehicle and sound a chime to help you avoid a collision.

TITLE: Lincoln Co-Pilot360™
DESCRIPTION:
Putting information and confidence at your fingertips. The Lincoln Co-Pilot360™ suite of five driver-assistance features61
 comes standard with every Lincoln Corsair to provide enhanced confidence on the road and expanded awareness of the world around you. Features include Blind Spot Detection with Cross-Traffic Alert, Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking, a Lane-Keeping System, Rear View Camera and Auto High-Beam Headlamps.

TITLE: 360-Degree Camera
DESCRIPTION: A better view. Expand your sight with a series of built-in cameras that provide a bird’s-eye view around the vehicle. The available system also offers a front or rear view, and a front/rear split view showing what is in front of or behind the vehicle along with views showing cross traffic. All the views are accessed with a button near the screen, giving you enhanced awareness to make sure that most maneuvers are free of obstacles.61

TITLE: Head-Up Display
DESCRIPTION:
Keep your eyes on the road by getting data you need to know at a glance. The available digital head-up display61
 projects standard driver information on your windshield. The display is viewable in virtually all lighting conditions and can be read while wearing polarized sunglasses. You can customize the data that displays, including available Adaptive Cruise Control settings, Lane-Keeping System information and more.

TITLE: Waze
DESCRIPTION: Get where you’re going faster. By connecting to the Waze* navigation app through SYNC® 3 AppLink®, Lincoln drivers can identify and follow the best route based on ever-changing traffic situations. Crowd-sourced intel and updates will guide you to the path of least resistance.

TITLE: SYNC® 3 AppLink With Apple CarPlay® Compatibility
DESCRIPTION: An interface that follows the sound of your voice.* SYNC® 3 voice-activated technology integrates your favorite apps and connects to your smartphone,** empowering you to access media, information and entertainment anywhere you go through voice commands and a responsive touchscreen.

TITLE: Revel® Audio System
DESCRIPTION: Get the sensation of sitting in front-row concert seats from the comfort of your vehicle. The Lincoln Corsair available Revel® Audio System features 14 speakers, a 12-channel amplifier and QuantumLogic™ surround sound technology to create an immersive and exhilarating sound experience.

TITLE: Lincoln Connect™
DESCRIPTION: Stay connected everywhere you go. Lincoln Connect™* is built-in technology that connects you to your Lincoln Corsair through your mobile device. Powered by a 4G LTE modem and the AT&T network, Lincoln Connect allows you to access convenient features and information—like remote start and maintenance data via the Lincoln Way™ app** on your smartphone.

TITLE: Lincoln+Alexa
DESCRIPTION: Bring along a helpful passenger. With Lincoln+Alexa, you can recreate the experience of having an Echo at home, on the road. Access to many at-home Amazon Alexa skills and services in your vehicle is now as easy as connecting your phone through SYNC® 3 AppLink.®*

TITLE: Headlamp Technology
DESCRIPTION: Focus on the bright road ahead of you with available jeweled LED headlamps that are both beautiful and functional. The brilliant appearance of the headlamps gives the face of the vehicle gorgeous depth and interest. Beyond appearance, smart technology monitors and responds to the road—bending into curves and providing a clear view with speed-dependent lighting.

TITLE: CONSIDERATE PROMPTS
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Corsair interface provides a warm and human touch by offering considerate prompts. When you’re low on gas, a message in the digital cluster can direct you to a nearby gas station; if your tires need air, your car can provide available turn-by-turn navigation to the closest dealership*; and if you are stopped on the side of the road, your vehicle will ask if you need assistance calling help. It’s all just another small way Lincoln is integrating convenience into the driver experience.

TITLE: PERSONAL PROFILES
DESCRIPTION: A vehicle that recalls your unique preferences. With personal profiles, the Lincoln Corsair can recognize drivers by their key fob and automatically adjust to preselected settings, including seat positions, audio and available ambient lighting preferences.

TITLE: WIRELESS CHARGING PAD
DESCRIPTION: Cut the cords and charge your smartphone with ease. Whenever you need a charge, an available sleek, subtle wireless charging pad* lets you power up your phone without plugging in. Located in the center console, the charger is designed as a side clip that saves space and can prevent your device from sliding around. This cord-free experience allows you to be hands-free and reduce clutter in the front seats—adding another touch of convenient luxury and smart technology to your ride.

TITLE: PHONE AS A KEY
DESCRIPTION: Available Phone as a Key allows you to access vehicle commands, settings and information from your personal device. Through the Lincoln Way™ app,* your smartphone can be set up to execute traditional key fob functions such as unlock, lock, remote start and liftgate access.** Via a Bluetooth® connection, your phone will grant you entry into the Lincoln Corsair and allow you to start it with the simple press of a button. And if your phone dies, a backup system on the Corsair allows you to simply enter a PIN to unlock and start the vehicle.

TITLE: Lincoln Embrace
DESCRIPTION: Receive a warm welcome every time you head out for a drive. The Lincoln Embrace adds a human touch to your vehicle as it activates upon your approach.

TITLE: AUTOFOLD POWER SIDEVIEW MIRRORS
DESCRIPTION: A nod in the right direction. The Lincoln Corsair sideview mirrors will fold out when you get in and fold in when you park and lock the doors. Additionally, if you’re maneuvering a tight parking spot, sideview mirrors can be folded or unfolded on demand by using a switch on the driver’s door.

TITLE: AMBIENT LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: Immerse yourself in your own little world with an expressive interior. The Lincoln Corsair allows you to set the mood each time you drive available ambient lighting that features seven different colors. Whether you want to energize your ride or create a relaxing sanctuary, ambient lighting can evoke a unique vibe every time.

TITLE: APPROACH DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: A vehicle that anticipates every drive. Your Lincoln Corsair will invite you in with sequential lighting, a Lincoln logo welcome mat, a soft LED exterior glow and overhead lighting that illuminates the interior.

TITLE: PANORAMIC VISTA ROOF®
DESCRIPTION: Let in the light with an available panoramic Vista Roof® that adds a spacious and airy feel to the interior of the Lincoln Corsair—giving you plenty of open breathing room and refreshing headspace. Bask in the sun even on the brightest days with a power sunshade that keeps the vehicle cool when the temperature rises.

TITLE: PERFECT POSITION SEATS
DESCRIPTION: Sit back and relax with available premium leather-trimmed seats that reinforce your posture and conform to your body. Available Perfect Position front seats offer customizable comfort with 24-way adjustability, heating and ventilation as well as power thigh extenders that provide individual leg comfort. The front seats also feature five available massage settings—Lower Rolling, Upper Rolling, Circular Cushion, Full Recovery and Relax Recovery—with three different intensity levels. For every journey you take, you can take comfort in the fact that Lincoln has your back.

TITLE: Floating Center Console
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Corsair was designed with the tech-savvy in mind. Added storage space for all your media and devices has been cleverly created for the front seats through a floating center console and media bin.

TITLE: Second-Row Sliding Seat
DESCRIPTION: Easily adjust your vehicle’s passenger and cargo space with a second-row sliding seat. The Lincoln Corsair offers added adaptability and storage capacity with a second-row seat designed to adjust to different situations. The sliding seat bench can recline a full six degrees back and slide nearly six inches forward or back. This provides more legroom for rear-seat passengers or opens up more room in the cargo area*—empowering you to customize your ride based on your precious cargo.

TITLE: Expanded Cargo Capacity
DESCRIPTION: Put everything in its place. The Corsair has ample space throughout the entire vehicle*. It integrates flexible cargo areas and configurations, including a package tray and underfloor stowage, adding storage in surprising places.

TITLE: EasyFold® Capability
DESCRIPTION: Seats that easily adjust. When you need to load long items, operating the second-row EasyFold® seating is as simple as pushing a power release button in the cargo area.* This button will command the electrified system to release forward on its own—making the reconfiguration of your seating a breeze. Additionally, the second-row seats can be manually folded flat to provide an abundance of storage space.

TITLE: HANDS-FREE LIFTGATE
DESCRIPTION: A helping hand when you need it. The available hands-free liftgate opens with a simple kick under the rear bumper to support you when loading and unloading. With the modern multitasker in mind, this feature helps you avoid a balancing act between carrying cargo and opening the liftgate manually or with a key fob.

TITLE: Exterior Aesthetic
DESCRIPTION: An expressive aesthetic. The Lincoln Corsair embodies drama, depth and attraction through a free-form exterior of flowing, connected lines. Inspired by human beauty and movement, curvature is implemented into every aspect of the body to establish a stunning landscape of seductive form. Peaks and valleys drawn from natural elements and exaggerated lines draw a vision of continuous light play that reflects its environment and creates a sense of a moving sculpture. With a unique harmony and balance, this design emerges from its environment with an elegant yet confident grace.

TITLE: Reserve Appearance Package
DESCRIPTION: Match the spirited drive of the Lincoln Corsair with a sportier vibe. The Reserve Appearance Package includes attractive upgrades, such as 20-inch wheels, unique body-color elements and a distinctive grille design.

TITLE: Impressive Wheel Lineup
DESCRIPTION: The beautiful curvature of the exterior is extended into sporty wheel designs that feature radial and directional lines. The Lincoln Corsair offers a number of eye-catching wheels to select from, including two 18-inch, two 19-inch and two 20-inch options, giving customers the power to choose the style they like best.

TITLE: Reserve Grille Design
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Corsair Reserve model comes with a unique grille design. The shape of the Lincoln Star is repeated throughout the grille with floating chrome accents that catch the light to stand out against black webbing.

TITLE: Standard Grille Design
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln signature grille crowns the graceful lines featured on the front of the car with contemporary luxury distinction. With a clean chrome face featuring elegant lines, the grille adds an attractive accent to the front facade.

TITLE: REAR LED LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln signature full-width horizontal taillamps with a starburst-pattern feature emphasize the design lines of the vehicle to create a striking visual. A delicate arrangement of sunrays radiates out to the edges of the clamshell liftgate to produce a streamlined look. Married with a soft curvature, the fluid subtleties of this LED light strip achieve an appearance that feels fresh and cutting edge.

TITLE: TWIN-TURBOCHARGED 2.7L V6 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Discover an impressive combination of power and quietness. The available twin-turbocharged 2.7L V6 engine* is ready for wherever the road takes you, delivering 335 horsepower and 380 lb.-ft. of torque**. In creating it, our engineers were mindful of fuel efficiency as well as sound, designing it to be remarkably quiet. The result? An EPA-estimated highway fuel economy rating of 26 mpg†.

TITLE: 2.0L TURBOCHARGED I-4 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: The 250-horsepower* turbocharged I-4 2.0L engine uses three technologies—the boost of turbocharging, the precision of direct injection and the sophistication of twin independent variable camshaft timing (Ti-VCT). The result is an outstandingly smooth drive.

TITLE: 8-SPEED TRANSMISSION
DESCRIPTION: More shift points make for a smooth drive. The Lincoln Nautilus features an 8-speed SelectShift® transmission to create a more elegant and effortless sensation when shifting gears.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB),61 a standard feature of Lincoln Co-Pilot360™, can potentially help avoid or lessen the severity of a traffic accident. A vehicle with AEB supports the driver by helping to avoid or lessen the severity of front crashes with another vehicle in certain situations. By using camera technology, if the system detects another vehicle, it can provide a collision warning and automatically apply the brakes if the driver has not taken corrective action.

TITLE: AVAILABLE ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP-AND-GO AND LANE CENTERING
DESCRIPTION:
Adaptive Cruise Control in the Lincoln Nautilus does much more than keep the vehicle traveling at a set speed. Stop-and-Go marries camera and radar, so the Nautilus can sense and adjust to the pace of cars ahead.61
Stop-and-Go allows the vehicle to come to a complete stop and restart when traffic begins to move.* Plus, Lane Centering uses data from the forward-looking radar and camera to provide continuous steering support to help keep the vehicle centered in the lane.

TITLE: ELECTRIC POWER-ASSISTED STEERING
DESCRIPTION: Electric power-assisted steering (EPAS) provides an easy, fluid steering feel at low speeds and a firmer and more controlled feel at higher speeds. The system constantly monitors and detects changing road conditions and compensates for road surface irregularities.

TITLE: INTELLIGENT ALL-WHEEL DRIVE
DESCRIPTION: Available Intelligent AWD uses sensors to constantly monitor traction. It delivers torque to the front and rear wheels to enhance handling and maximize grip, typically before wheelslip can even occur.

TITLE: AUTO HOLD
DESCRIPTION: Auto Hold offers relief when you come to stop signs, long traffic signals and other braking situations. When you stop the vehicle using the brake pedal, the system will hold and then release the brakes when the accelerator is pushed.

TITLE: FULL LED MULTI-PROJECTOR HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: The available full LED multi-projector headlamps provide a broad field of light, giving the driver a wide field of awareness of what lies ahead. The independent lenses can change position to widen or narrow the path of light in the direction in which the vehicle is traveling.

TITLE: BLIND SPOT DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: Blind Spot Detection with Cross-Traffic Alert61 helps warn you of vehicles you might otherwise miss. The system uses radar in the rear quarter panels to identify a vehicle entering your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the sideview mirror. Cross-Traffic Alert also uses radar to detect vehicles approaching from either side when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or your driveway. If it detects a vehicle approaching from up to 15 yards away, it sends an audible warning, a visual display in the sideview mirror and a signal in the message center.

TITLE: REAR VIEW CAMERA WITH REAR CAMERA WASH
DESCRIPTION: The Rear View Camera takes the guesswork out of knowing what is behind your vehicle.61  Should the camera lens become dirty, cleaning it is as simple as activating the rear window windshield wash that simultaneously triggers the camera wash—making what’s behind you clear as day.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Pre-Collision Assist with Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB)61 can potentially help you avoid or lessen the severity of a traffic accident. A vehicle with AEB supports the driver by helping avoid or lessen the severity of front crashes with another vehicle in certain situations. Using camera technology, if the system detects another vehicle, it can provide a collision warning and then automatically apply the brakes if the driver has not taken corrective action.

TITLE: LANE-KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The Lane-Keeping System61  uses a camera mounted behind the windshield’s rearview mirror to monitor road lane markings and detect unintentional drifting toward the outside of a lane. If the camera detects an impending drift, the system will use steering and the instrument cluster display to alert and/or aid the driver to stay in the lane.

TITLE: AUTO HIGH-BEAM HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: In low-light situations, Auto High-Beam Headlamps amplify the amount of light emitted from your headlamps to give you a better view of what lies ahead.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP-AND-GO AND LANE CENTERING
DESCRIPTION: Available Adaptive Cruise Control in the Lincoln Nautilus does much more than keep the vehicle traveling at a set speed. Stop-and-Go marries camera and radar, so the Nautilus can sense and adjust to the pace of cars ahead.61  Stop-and-Go allows the vehicle to come to a complete stop and restart when traffic begins to move.* Plus, Lane Centering uses data from the forward-looking radar and camera to provide continuous steering support to help keep the vehicle centered in the lane.

TITLE: ENHANCED ACTIVE PARK ASSIST
DESCRIPTION: Available Enhanced Active Park Assist makes getting in or out of tight parking spaces easy.61 Ultrasonic sensors can locate an available spot and help the vehicle steer into place. Perpendicular park assist helps you guide the vehicle into perpendicular spots when you’re in Reverse, while park out assist aids in getting out of tight parallel parking spots. Meanwhile, you control the shifter buttons, brake and accelerator for seamless positioning.

TITLE: 360-DEGREE CAMERA*
DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your field of vision from every angle. Four cameras on the front, rear and sides merge to provide a bird’s-eye view around the vehicle.61  You’ll be better able to see down sidewalks while backing up and navigating tight parking spots. Plus, a 180-degree split-view camera located in the vehicle’s grille helps boost visibility in cross-traffic situations, intersections and seeing around parked cars.

TITLE: LINCOLN CONNECT™ WITH LINCOLN WAY™ APP*
DESCRIPTION: Focus your time and energy on what matters most with an app that revitalizes your ownership experience. With a vehicle equipped with Lincoln Connect, you can control your Lincoln with complimentary start/stop, lock/unlock and scheduled remote start features.* In addition, you can receive important vehicle information such as Vehicle Health Alerts, service history and warranty information right on your phone.

TITLE: LINCOLN CONNECT™
DESCRIPTION: With a Lincoln Connect-enabled vehicle, the convenience and luxury of complimentary Lincoln Way™ remote functions are at your fingertips. That’s when you’ll appreciate the available Lane-Keeping System.61 ** When activated, it can detect when your car is drifting out of its lane and can warn you through a subtle vibration in the steering wheel. Additional settings allow the system to apply steering torque that helps you to steer back to the correct path.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC EMERGENCY BRAKING
DESCRIPTION: Forward collision warning with brake support can alert you if it senses a potential collision with the car in front of you. A red light, which simulates brake lights, flashes on the windshield. If you don’t react immediately, the brakes will precharge and increase brake-assist sensitivity to provide full responsiveness when you do brake.

TITLE: BLIS® WITH CROSS-TRAFFIC ALERT
DESCRIPTION: Available BLIS (Blind Spot Information System) with cross-traffic alert61 helps warn you of vehicles you might otherwise miss. BLIS uses radar in the rear quarter panels to identify a vehicle entering your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the sideview mirror. Cross-traffic alert also uses radar to detect vehicles approaching from either side when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or your driveway. If it detects a vehicle approaching from up to 15 yards away, it sends an audible warning, a visual display in the sideview mirror and a signal in the message center.

TITLE: STANDARD REAR VIEW CAMERA
DESCRIPTION: Activated when you shift into Reverse, the rear view camera61 can show you certain objects that are behind your vehicle. It can also be a helpful assistant when you’re connecting a trailer. When in Reverse, a video image is displayed on the central screen, with red, yellow and green guidelines providing an easy reference for how far an object is behind you.

TITLE: LED HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Signature LED accents frame the sculpted LED headlamps that create a powerful path of light.

TITLE: LINCOLN DRIVE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Lincoln Drive Control, a collection of ride-enhancing technologies includes adaptive suspension which allows you to select from one of the three available modes—Normal, Sport or Comfort—to suit your mood. Once a mode is selected, the adaptive suspension utilizes an array of sensors to monitor and adjust itself to offer the optimal ride based on your choice.

DESCRIPTION: Once parked, your MKC awaits your return. As you approach with your key fob in your hand, purse or pocket the vehicle senses your approach (up to eight feet away) and exterior lighting brightens. Press a button on the liftgate or kick your foot under the rear bumper again and the liftgate closes smoothly.

Engage and enjoy. The evolution of Adaptive Cruise Control61

The MKZ can then automatically brake and accelerate to keep you at your set speed or follow at a preset distance with the pace of traffic when speeds are below your set speed. With the addition of Stop-and-Go, the feature can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and restart it as traffic begins to move. *

TITLE: ACTIVE NOISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Active noise control heightens overall cabin sound quality by reducing unwanted noise while enhancing sound that is desired. Microphones monitor the sound profile of the cabin, which is then inverted by a signal processor to create an opposing acoustic wave through the speakers. When the opposing wave meets the original sound wave, they cancel each other out, providing a more pleasant driving experience.

With the addition of Stop-and-Go, the feature can bring your vehicle to a complete stop in stopped traffic and restart it as traffic begins to move. *

DESCRIPTION: Active noise control heightens overall cabin sound quality by reducing unwanted noise while enhancing sound that is desired. When the opposing wave meets the original sound wave, they cancel each other out, providing a more pleasant driving experience.

DESCRIPTION: Stay connected to your vehicle — and the features and benefits of Lincoln ownership — with the Lincoln Way™ app.* Unlock and start your Lincoln remotely.** Get Roadside Assistance† and personalized customer service with a Lincoln Concierge. And schedule complimentary Lincoln Pickup & Delivery™†† when your vehicle needs service. The future of driving is at hand. Download the Lincoln Way app now — and see where the road takes you.

TITLE: APPLE CARPLAY®
DESCRIPTION: Apple CarPlay® takes the things you want to do with your iPhone® while driving and puts them right on your car’s built-in display. You can get directions, make calls, send and receive messages, and listen to music, all in a way that allows you to stay focused on the road. Just connect your iPhone and go.

TITLE: LINCOLN CONNECT™ WITH 4G LTE WI-FI HOTSPOT
DESCRIPTION: Lincoln Connect™* lets you and your passengers easily access a 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot. Up to 10 devices can be connected at the same time with an operational range of up to 50 feet from the vehicle. Plus, when you download and activate the available Lincoln Way™ app, you can track your Wi-Fi usage.

TITLE: CONFIGURABLE DIGITAL DISPLAY
DESCRIPTION: The configurable digital display allows you to choose select information that is important to you when you’re behind the wheel. While certain information must remain, items like audio settings, directions and more can be added to or removed from the display.

TITLE: LINCOLN EMBRACE
DESCRIPTION: You’ve arrived and your Continental knows it. When it senses your approach, a suite of features activates as if to say “Welcome back” and “Where to next?”

TITLE: APPROACH DETECTION
DESCRIPTION: As you approach your Lincoln Continental, with your key fob in your possession, the vehicle senses the fob and initiates a number of welcoming lighting sequences.

TITLE: LINCOLN LOGO WELCOME MAT
DESCRIPTION: After detecting your key fob, a glowing Lincoln logo welcome mat is projected on the ground by the driver and front passenger’s doors to welcome you back.

TITLE: AMBIENT LIGHTING
DESCRIPTION: While the exterior puts on a dazzling light show by illuminating the headlamps, taillamps and door handle pockets, inside, colored ambient lighting brightens the cabin.

TITLE:
MONOCHROMATIC PACKAGE
PRISTINE WHITE*
DESCRIPTION: This unique package offers 20-inch blacked-out wheels with Pristine White exterior paint. The upper and lower portions of the grille are painted to match the body color while a body-color fender badge and sideview mirrors act as stylish finishing touches.

TITLE:
MONOCHROMATIC PACKAGE
INFINITE BLACK*
DESCRIPTION: Similar to the Pristine White version, the Infinite Black Monochromatic Package features the same shape, form, 20-inch blacked-out wheels and accents matching the Infinite Black body color.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE BI-FUNCTIONAL HIGH INTENSITY DISCHARGE HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Helping to place light in the right place at the right time. At faster speeds these headlamps cast a beam of light farther to help drivers see distant objects. At slower speeds the beam of light is cast over a shorter, wider area to identify potential nearby objects and pedestrians.

TITLE: LIGHT TOUCH HANDLE
DESCRIPTION: The Light Touch Handle has a small button that, when touched, unlatches the door electronically, allowing it to be opened in a single smooth motion. Attention to the handle’s position keeps the Continental’s long, flowing lines intact. Plus, entrances and exits are made even more graceful with an available soft close door that gently gathers in the door and secures it.

TITLE: HANDS-FREE, FOOT ACTIVATED TRUNK LID
DESCRIPTION: The hands-free, foot-activated trunk lid allows owners to conveniently open or close the trunk lid with a simple straight kicking motion under the rear bumper when the key fob is detected.

TITLE: A SEAMLESS EXPERIENCE
DESCRIPTION: The Lincoln Continental was crafted to present a culmination of interior amenities that create an overwhelmingly graceful experience. The seamlessly connected center console and laser-cut rolltop cupholder door use connecting lines for elegant flow. In-door seat controls, a front driver’s seat that fully retracts as you exit, striking wood inlays and available rich leather surfaces surround you in an interior that is rejuvenating and decidedly Continental.

TITLE: INTERIOR CRAFTSMANSHIP
DESCRIPTION: Craftsmanship goes far beyond what the eye can see. In the Lincoln Continental, it can also be felt and even heard. Available leather makes the optional Perfect Position Seats even more inviting. The available 19-speaker Revel® Ultima Audio System brings every note to life, and real wood accents help underscore a calm, cool and decidedly Continental state of mind.

TITLE: REAR-SEAT AMENITIES PACKAGE
DESCRIPTION: A back seat that simply doesn’t take one. With power lumbar support, massage, heating and ventilating, and ample leg room, the reclining rear seat included in the available Rear-Seat Amenities Package has many features, including climate and audio controls and rear-window shade screens that will make you sit up and take notice.

TITLE: BROWN SWIRL WALNUT
DESCRIPTION: The swirling patterns of this open-pore wood make a fanciful statement.

TITLE: ESPRESSO ASH SWIRL
DESCRIPTION: Darker and more subtle than Brown Swirl Walnut, this real wood appliqué sets a more serene tone.

TITLE: TWIN-PANEL MOONROOF
DESCRIPTION: The available twin-panel moonroof with power shade presents an all-glass, two-panel sky view. The power-retractable front panel glides open without obstructing rear-seat passengers’ overhead views.

TITLE: LINCOLN SIGNATURE GRILLE
DESCRIPTION: The bold one-piece Lincoln signature grille – featuring distinctive Lincoln Star mesh – is designed to turn heads and widen eyes.

TITLE: TWIN-TURBOCHARGED 3.0L V6 ENGINE
DESCRIPTION: Thanks to an available Twin-Turbocharged 3.0L V6 engine,* efficient horsepower per liter output and an available AWD powertrain, the Continental is one drive you’re sure to remember. With standard Dynamic Torque Vectoring,** all-wheel drive, 400 horsepower and 400 lb.-ft. of torque,† it’s also a drive you’ll wish to repeat.

TITLE: DYNAMIC TORQUE VECTORING
DESCRIPTION: Raw power can turn heads, but refined power is what truly deserves attention. Dynamic Torque Vectoring* delivers power on demand to the appropriate rear wheel while cornering.** This feature enhances agility and helps maintain a smooth and seamless driving experience.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: Comfort, Normal or Sport? The adaptive suspension gives you the freedom of choice to help match your mood to the road ahead.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE CRUISE CONTROL WITH STOP-AND-GO
DESCRIPTION:
Now, navigating traffic can feel a little more effortless. Adaptive cruise control with stop-and-go marries camera and radar, enabling the Continental to detect and adjust to the pace of nearby cars.61 
Stop-and-go functionality allows the vehicle to come to a complete stop and restart when traffic begins to move.*

TITLE: AUTO HOLD
DESCRIPTION: Auto Hold offers a new form of relief when you come to stop signs, signals and other braking situations. When the system is engaged and the driver uses the brake pedal to bring the vehicle to a standstill, the system will hold and then release the brakes when the accelerator is pushed.

TITLE: ACTIVE NOISE CONTROL
DESCRIPTION: Active Noise Control heightens overall cabin sound quality by reducing unwanted noise. Microphones monitor the sound profile of the cabin, which is then inverted by a signal processor to create an opposing acoustic wave through the speakers. When the opposing wave meets the original sound wave, they cancel each other out, providing a more pleasant driving experience.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE SUSPENSION
DESCRIPTION: Comfort, Normal or Sport? The adaptive suspension gives you the freedom of choice to help match your mood to the road ahead.

TITLE: ELECTRIC POWER-ASSISTED STEERING
DESCRIPTION: Electric power-assisted steering provides an easy, fluid feel at low speeds and a firmer, more controlled feel at higher speeds. It also continuously adapts to changing road conditions and compensates for surface irregularities.

TITLE: LINCOLN CO-PILOT360™
DESCRIPTION: The Continental includes a suite of our most advanced technology ever so that you can start your journey with confidence.

TITLE: PRE-COLLISION ASSIST
DESCRIPTION: Pre-collision assist with Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB)61 may help avoid or lessen the severity of a traffic accident in certain situations. By using radar and camera technology to scan the road ahead, if the system detects another vehicle, it can provide a collision warning and will automatically apply the brakes if the driver has not taken corrective action.

TITLE: LANE KEEPING SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: The Lane-Keeping System61  uses a camera mounted behind the windshield’s rearview mirror to monitor road lane markings and detect unintentional drifting toward the outside of a lane. If the camera detects an impending drift, the system will use the steering system and the instrument cluster display to alert and/or help you to stay in your lane.

TITLE: AUTOMATIC HIGH BEAMS
DESCRIPTION: In low light, automatic high beams61  amplify the amount of light emitted from your headlamps to give you a better view of what lies ahead.

TITLE: Blind Spot Detection With Cross-Traffic Alert
DESCRIPTION: Blind Spot Detection with Cross-Traffic Alert61 helps warn you of vehicles you might otherwise miss. The system uses radar in the rear quarter panels to identify a vehicle entering your blind spot and alerts you with an indicator light in the sideview mirror. Cross-traffic alert also uses radar to detect vehicles approaching from either side when you’re slowly backing out of a parking spot or your driveway. If it detects a vehicle approaching from up to 15 yards away, it sends an audible warning, a visual display in the sideview mirror and a signal in the message center.

TITLE: Rear Backup Camera
DESCRIPTION: The rear backup camera61 takes the guesswork out of knowing what is behind your vehicle.

TITLE: HEAD-UP DISPLAY*
DESCRIPTION:
By allowing drivers to keep their eyes on the road, the Head-Up Display** helps being aware of the road ahead easier. It contributes to a custom driving experience by letting drivers choose what data to display, from standard driving information to adaptive cruise control settings, lane-keeping information and more. The Continental Head-Up Display, with its adjustable viewing position, is the biggest and brightest windshield-projected informational display in its class.† 
Plus, digital light projection, another industry-first for Lincoln, allows the display to be visible in more ambient lighting conditions than systems offered by competitors, even when the driver is wearing polarized sunglasses.

TITLE: ADAPTIVE HEADLAMPS
DESCRIPTION: Dynamic adaptive HID headlamps, standard on the Lincoln Continental, swivel from side to side with the steering wheel. As you turn the steering wheel, the entire beam pattern sweeps across the road in the direction of the turn, helping to illuminate a wider stretch of road when compared to non- adaptive headlamps. At speeds between 1 and 35 mph, the reflectors in the available adaptive full-LED headlamps widen the low-beam pattern to help illuminate pedestrians or other roadside objects. The reflectors also adapt in relation to the steering wheel position, adding more light in the direction of the turn.

TITLE: 360-DEGREE CAMERA
DESCRIPTION:
The available 360-degree camera61 
lets you maneuver in low-speed situations with a view of your surroundings. Four cameras, one on the front, rear and sides merge to provide a bird’s-eye view around the vehicle. This system will allow you to have a better awareness of what might be around corners, down alleyways and while backing into tight parking spaces.

TITLE: PERFECT POSITION SEAT
DESCRIPTION: Welcome to your comfort zone. The Perfect Position Seat with available Active Motion® massage features a range of adjustability and independent thigh extenders to comfort, support and rejuvenate. With in-door controls, the seats easily adjust for a uniquely comfortable position – as if you needed any more reason to never get out.

TITLE: REAR-SEAT AMENITIES PACKAGE*
DESCRIPTION: A back seat that simply doesn’t take one. With power lumbar support, massage, heating and ventilating, and ample leg room, the reclining rear seat included in the available Rear-Seat Amenities Package has a bevy of features that will make you sit up and take notice.

TITLE: IN-COMMAND STEERING WHEEL
DESCRIPTION: To best present ever-evolving technology, Lincoln designers and engineers took a holistic approach to redefining what a steering wheel can, and should, do. Controls for the configurable digital display, SYNC® 3 and more are positioned for ease of use. Wood inlay and leather-wrapped airbag covers help to create a steering wheel that is as functional as it is elegant.

TITLE: IN-DOOR SEAT CONTROLS
DESCRIPTION: Comfort should never be kept at arm’s length, which is why designers mounted available seat controls right in the door – to harmonize with the movements of both passengers and the driver. And the buttons themselves – both their position and feel – have undergone the same careful consideration as the rest of the vehicle.

TITLE: REVEL® AUDIO SYSTEM
DESCRIPTION: With 19 expertly placed speakers in the available Revel®* Ultima® Audio System, the Continental delivers music in breathtaking audiophile quality. With QuantumLogic Surround® (QLS), you can immerse yourself in sound by choosing from three distinctly different listening modes, including Stereo, Audience and Onstage. And with Clari-Fi, a patented HARMAN technology, the sound system rebuilds audio details lost in digitally compressed music. With precision-milled speaker covers seamlessly integrated into the doors, we’ve ensured even the design hits all the notes. Personalize your listening experience even further with a year-long membership to TIDAL®**, the high-fidelity music streaming service that places over sixty million songs at your fingertips, complimentary with the purchase or lease of any new 2019 Lincoln Continental.

TITLE: SYNC® 3
DESCRIPTION: SYNC 312  is our easy-to-use and responsive voice-activated technology. Discover its quick response to your voice commands. Experience the smartphone-like touchscreen with impressive efficiency. You’ll also find a sleek, user-friendly interface to help you connect to and control your smartphone. Locate your favorite restaurants with simple destination entry via the optional Navigation System. SYNC 3 is fast, smart and easy to use.27

DESCRIPTION: As you approach with your key fob in your hand, pocket or purse, the headlamps, taillights and door handle lights illuminate. Inside, the dome light and colored ambient lighting create an even warmer welcome.

DESCRIPTION: Scotland’s Bridge of Weir has long been a supplier of fine automotive upholstery, so it was only fitting for them to bring their soft, supple leather to a new symbol of first-class international travel. DESCRIPTION: The bold one-piece Lincoln signature grille – featuring distinctive Lincoln Star mesh – is designed to turn heads and widen eyes.
